title: The Complete Tales from the Crypt
description: The Complete run of the EC comic book TALES FROM THE CRYPT (including THE CRYPT OF TERROR) reprinted from the original artwork in glorious b&w (with full cover glossy cover inserts) along with all related ads, letters page, text pieces, etc. into five hardcover volumes stored in a handsome slipcover. The stories and stark black-and-white artwork by Johnny Craig, Wally Wood, Jack Davis, Al Felstein, et. al. are superb. They date from 1950 to 1955.
author: William M. Gaines
